alert.note: Alert for Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL RIO ARRIBA, NORTHWESTERN SANDOVAL AND SOUTHEASTERN SAN JUAN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Nageezi, or 37 miles south of Bloomfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nageezi and Counselor. This includes Highway 550 between Mile Markers 90 and 118. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.
